docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Allergic reactions set off by sexual intercourse may be responsible for a significant number of cases of recurrent vaginitis, including some in which yeast infections are found, recent studies indicate.

headline.main: Gynecology; Allergies in Sex Linked to Some Vaginitis Cases

docs.snippet: LEAD: Allergic reactions set off by sexual intercourse may be responsible for a significant number of cases of recurrent vaginitis, including some in which yeast infections are found, recent studies indicate.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Even in his younger years, Walter Smith was not the best of drivers. But as age began to rob this rural Minnesotan of good vision and hearing, agility and quick reflexes, he became an increasing hazard on the road.
